title: YouTube Live Chat Fullscreen | Official Site
description: A must-have open-source extension for viewers wanting immersion and interaction‚Äîenjoy chat without ever leaving fullscreen.
heroDesc: Seamlessly read and send chat messages in fullscreen mode, without interrupting your viewing.

features.title: Fullscreen Chat
features.desc: View and send chat messages in fullscreen.

features.title: Customisable Chat
features.desc: Change the background colour, text colour, font size, and more.

features.title: Flexible Window
features.desc: Drag and resize the chat window as you like.
